mapper.insert: insert into ask values (null, #{ask_title}, #{ask_content}, #{ask_writer}, now(), null, null, null)
mapper.update: update ask set ask_title = #{ask_title}, ask_content = #{ask_content} where ask_no = #{ask_no}
mapper.select: select * from ask where ask_title like CONCAT('%', #{ask_title}, '%') and ask_writer = #{ask_writer} order by ask_no desc
